phases.description: Resolve critical system conflicts and consolidate duplicated functionality
completedFeatures: Resolve Site System conflict between enums and data structures
Fix Task Hierarchy conflict in data relationships
Consolidate Financial Methods duplication across APIs
Fix API Route inconsistencies (standardize entityId parameter).
Standardize Modal z-index management using Z_INDEX_LAYERS
Remove unused logging utilities and consolidate duplicated functions
Fix Task Completion logic duplication and Consolidate date formatting constants
Clean up unused theme configurations and seed data
Refactor item import logic, for consistency

phases.description: Complete Week Sale Event, Data Sync and Items Debug and add Front End Sections
completedFeatures: create and populate Offers Section in the Frontend
payments methods modal in the Frontend
create and populate Bio Section in the Frontend
Task Modal UX Fixes, Task Detail View Improvements and Task Tree Enhancement
Frontend Completion, Portfolio, Animation, Projects Sections
Create and Link Seven Elements Web Game vercel app in the Projects Section
Solve idempotency bug in task completion and Clear Logs Integration in both localhost and Vercel

phases.description: Implement shared data storage across browsers using KV database while keeping local-first development
completedFeatures: Complete logging coverage for all task types (recurrent Parents, Templates, Instances)
Seamless Vercel deployment with KV storage (fix EROFS read-only filesystem errors)
Comprehensive backfill system for all log types (tasks, items, financials, player)
Debug Items Log, eliminate 'Unknown Item' entries, task duplication, and Q + 0 (&&) bug
Robust cross-environment compatibility (KV for production, FS for development)
User Preferences api for tabs persistence in both environments and Price and Collection fields in Task Modal
Add a Not Paid checkmark functionality to the Task Modal, so the financials effects are not true
Implement Atomic Operations for all routes and APIs
Add Colones, Sats and USD calculations to the Assets Modal and fix Step/Decimals validation

phases.description: Implement shared data storage across browsers using KV database while keeping local-first development
completedFeatures: Add KV-backed APIs for tasks, items, assets, settings
Refactor DataStore to use hybrid storage mode
Implement initial sync and cache refresh
Test cross-browser data sharing in production
Create Dev Tools page and functionality for complex debugging and development
Full system clean up, refactor, extractions, debug console logs and old system code
